programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: Coverage of the 10th day's play at Roland Garros, featuring the opening men's and women's quarter-finals in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year. Jo-Wilfried Tsonga delighted his home crowd once again at this stage in 2015, defeating Japan's Kei Nishikori in five sets, while Stan Wawrinka beat his illustrious Swiss compatriot Roger Federer in a somewhat more comfortable manner, prevailing 6-4, 6-3, 7-6. In the women's competition, Ana Ivanovic reached her first Grand Slam semi-final since 2008 by overcoming Elina Svitolina in straight sets.(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: Coverage of the 11th day's play at Roland Garros, featuring the concluding men's and women's quarter-finals in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year. The biggest story of this stage in 2015 was surely the emphatic manner in which Novak Djokovic eliminated the most successful player in the competition's history, Rafael Nadal, prevailing 7-5, 6-3, 6-1. Elsewhere, Andy Murray maintained British interest in the competition with a 7-6, 6-2, 5-7, 6-1 victory over David Ferrer, and Serena Williams continued her march to the title with a 6-1, 6-3 triumph against 2012 champion Sara Errani.(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: Coverage of the 10th day's play at Roland Garros, featuring the opening men's and women's quarter-finals in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year. Jo-Wilfried Tsonga delighted his home crowd once again at this stage in 2015, defeating Japan's Kei Nishikori in five sets, while Stan Wawrinka beat his illustrious Swiss compatriot Roger Federer in a somewhat more comfortable manner, prevailing 6-4, 6-3, 7-6. In the women's competition, Ana Ivanovic reached her first Grand Slam semi-final since 2008 by overcoming Elina Svitolina in straight sets.(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: Coverage of the 11th day's play at Roland Garros, featuring the concluding men's and women's quarter-finals in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year. The biggest story of this stage in 2015 was surely the emphatic manner in which Novak Djokovic eliminated the most successful player in the competition's history, Rafael Nadal, prevailing 7-5, 6-3, 6-1. Elsewhere, Andy Murray maintained British interest in the competition with a 7-6, 6-2, 5-7, 6-1 victory over David Ferrer, and Serena Williams continued her march to the title with a 6-1, 6-3 triumph against 2012 champion Sara Errani.(n)

programme.title: Pescara - Novara 01/06
programme.desc: Cod. 494859. Serie B. Play Off. Semifinale di ritorno. Collegamento ore 20:00 con Prepartita. Dopo la vittoria per 2-0 in casa del Novara, il Pescara ha in pugno la qualificazione per la finale dei playoff. La formazione abruzzese puo' permettersi di perdere con 2 gol di scarto la gara di ritorno. Al Novara serve la grande impresa per qualificarsi, vincere con almeno 3 gol di scarto. Telecronaca: Antonio Nucera(n)
